sourcing.instructions: - As (Arsenic): Obtain from a chemical supply company with proper licenses.
steps: - As (Arsenic): Obtain from a chemical supply company with proper licenses.
1. Wear appropriate PPE (gloves, goggles, lab coat) when handling chemicals.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Wear appropriate PPE (gloves, goggles, lab coat) when handling chemicals.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixed composition into a crucible.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixed composition into a crucible.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool gradually to room temperature (approx. 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool gradually to room temperature (approx. 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible.
